text: Pitié-Salpêtrière University Hospital () is a well-known hospital in the 13th arrondissement of Paris."Pitié-Salpêtrière ." Assistance publique – Hôpitaux de Paris. Retrieved on 26 February 2015. "47–83 boulevard de l'Hôpital 75013 Paris" It is one of Europe's largest hospitals. It has a long history of treating patients with mental illnesses. Many famous people worked there, like Sigmund Freud, Georges-Gilles de la Tourette, and Jean-Martin Charcot. == References == Category:Hospitals in Paris
title: Pitié-Salpêtrière Hospital
